content: To my mind the system-level approach (EIP-4895) is cleaner and preferable to the transactions approach (EIP-4863). A question though: why do we need the index in EIP-4895?

If we want to expose withdrawals in the EL via logs/receipts, it might be simpler to just have a new txn type than to add this functionality to system level operations.
